entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the one who whispers to Harry and Ron to stay behind. She then ducks out from under the Cloak and enters a shop.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is with Harry and Hermione, and he feeds the Extendable Ears back under the door.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is with Ron and Hermione, and he receives a string from Ron.

entities.name: borgin
entities.description: Borgin is the one who does not answer Hermione's greeting but casts her a suspicious look.

entities.name: extendable ears
entities.description: The Extendable Ears are objects that Ron feeds back under the door.

relationships.description: Hermione greets Borgin, but he does not answer.
Ron feeds the Extendable Ears back under the door.
